Claim: "Two people in coats kissed on the side of a road."
Referring expressions: Two people, coats, road  People, another.
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInCoats(a) and IsOnSideOfRoad(b) and IsKissed(a,b))) & (forall f (forall h (forall g ( IsInCoats(f) ->  IsShownAppreciationFor(g,h))))) & (forall l (forall i (forall j (forall k (  IsKissed(i,j) ->  IsShownAppreciationFor(k,l))))))) -> (exists e (exists d (IsShownAppreciationFor(d,e) and IsAppreciated(d))))
